mapper.select: SELECT C.AREA_NAME AS "area", SUM(N_DRUGAMOUNT) AS "amount" FROM (SELECT A.AREA_NAME, I.N_DRUGAMOUNT,I.D_ACCEPTDATETIME FROM T_SIIP_DRUGINSTORE I LEFT JOIN DRUG_AREA A ON A.ID = I.AREA where I.D_ACCEPTDATETIME >= #{startDate} AND I.D_ACCEPTDATETIME <= #{endDate}) C GROUP BY C.AREA_NAME ORDER BY SUM(N_DRUGAMOUNT)

SELECT C.AREA_NAME AS "area", SUM(N_DRUGAMOUNT) AS "amount" FROM (SELECT A.AREA_NAME, O.N_DRUGAMOUNT,O.D_OUTDATETIME FROM T_SIIP_DRUGOUTSTORE O LEFT JOIN DRUG_AREA A ON A.ID = O.AREA where O.D_OUTDATETIME >= #{startDate} AND O.D_OUTDATETIME <= #{endDate}) C GROUP BY C.AREA_NAME ORDER BY SUM(N_DRUGAMOUNT)

SELECT C.AREA_NAME AS "area", SUM(N_AFTERINVAMOUNT) AS "amount" FROM (SELECT A.AREA_NAME, S.N_AFTERINVAMOUNT,S.D_INVSTORETIME FROM T_SIIP_INVDRUGSTORE S LEFT JOIN DRUG_AREA A ON A.ID = S.AREA where S.D_INVSTORETIME >= #{startDate} AND S.D_INVSTORETIME <= #{endDate}) C GROUP BY C.AREA_NAME ORDER BY SUM(N_AFTERINVAMOUNT)
